extendedInfo.description: Trade Storm is a stock market simulation game allowing you to trade stocks from the NYSE and NASDAQ. Get your feet wet investing in stocks without risking your hard earned money to become a virtual millionaire.Compete against players from around the world and watch your rank climb up the scoreboard.This application is currently in beta. Please send any feedback, or feature suggestions, to coldsnowstudios@gmail.com.Features:* Trade stocks from NYSE and NASDAQ* Up-to-date stock prices and details* Scoreboard ranking you against all other playersBuy Low. Sell High. Make Millions!

reviews.comment: Rarely syncs with the real time market prices. When it does it can takes hours. Good concept though, needs work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This game sucks way worse than M Market. Are you kidding me. It was a waste of space and my time. uninstall wasn\'t fast enough
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love this app! As soon as I get into the top ten I will start buying real stock...unless I bankrupt myself here!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awsome!
reviews.comment: Sweet stock simulator. Could add a couple features to give you more infirm on the stocks you buy and your portfolio. Besides those great app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool app for testing stocks
reviews.comment: I\'m up to $200 million gambling on high risk stocks. It\'s all or none.  I wouldn\'t do that with real cash. Wish it didn\'t stop at $200 million.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: There are better ones out there
reviews.comment: Stocks market simulater is much smoother and better and intuitive, it provides support info and most.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Few bugs, but good app
reviews.comment: There are a few kinks that needs to be worked out. The app tends to disappear for a day or two and then reappear. Good app besides occasional issue.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What happened?
reviews.comment: This was a great app... but it hasn\'t worked for 2 weeks now. Reinstalled, cleared data, everything I could think of. Guess they\'ve taken their server offline now or something.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: REQUIRE ACCOUNT
reviews.comment: Have to use an account, might be free but I didn\'t want to sign up for something.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs more visuals
reviews.comment: It\'s a good app, but it would be good to see how that stock has been doing previously with a graph or chart. It makes it harder to make good decisions on only current numbers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: should show how much profit/loss I would make if I sold my stocks right now instead of the percent rise next to the stock in the main screen
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Love it, no risk in life, but has all the excitement of actually being in the stock market

reviews.title: Review
reviews.comment: The most stable stocks real time game.  Please allow initial customized funds base.  Also, real time charts displays are needed.
